rationalpiano.graphic
Class PropertyControlP5

java.lang.Object
  rationalpiano.graphic.PropertyControlP5
All Implemented Interfaces:
controlP5.ControlListener, IDrawable, IPropertyControl
public class PropertyControlP5
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPropertyControl, controlP5.ControlListener

Displays mouse-tweakable controls to change parameters. Allows tweaking of Midi Input device.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Fabian Ehrentraud
Licence:
Licensed under the Open Software License (OSL 3.0)
Date:
2011-01-30

Constructor Detail

PropertyControlP5

public PropertyControlP5(processing.core.PApplet papplet,
                         ConfigurationData config)
Creates all new parameter controls on screen and registers the control event callback handler with the PApplet instance.

Parameters:
papplet - The processing applet to register the control event callback method.
config - The ConfigurationData object which allows tweaking and saving of prperties.
Method Detail

setup

private void setup()
Configures the parameter controls. At the moment just sets up a drop down list for Midi Input.

controlEvent

public void controlEvent(controlP5.ControlEvent receivedEvent)
Callback method which gets called from the PApplet instance when one of the parameter controls is tweaked

Specified by:
controlEvent in interface controlP5.ControlListener
Parameters:
receivedEvent - The received event.

Description copied from interface: IDrawable

isMouseOver

public boolean isMouseOver()
Specified by:
isMouseOver in interface IPropertyControl
Returns:

setListItems

public void setListItems(java.lang.String parameterName,
                         java.lang.String[] alternatives)
Description copied from interface: IPropertyControl
Sets the String-parameter control which controls the parameter for parameterName to the given alternatives.

Specified by:
setListItems in interface IPropertyControl
Parameters:
parameterName - The name of the String-parameter.
alternatives - The possible alternatives for the given parameter.

addInputMidi

public void addInputMidi(InputMidi inputMidi)
Description copied from interface: IPropertyControl
Adds the given object to the properties which can get changed. TODO make architecture more generic to be able to traverse parameter tweaks to all corresponding objects' methods

Specified by:
addInputMidi in interface IPropertyControl
Parameters:
inputMidi - The InputMidi object which is used to change the open Midi Input device with the setMidiInputDevice() method.
